text: Jude [strongs id="g2455" /], the servant [strongs id="g1401" /] of Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /], and [strongs id="g1161" /] brother [strongs id="g0080" /] of James [strongs id="g2385" /], to them that are sanctified [strongs id="g0037" m="PerfPasPtc" /] by [strongs id="g1722" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /] the Father [strongs id="g3962" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] preserved [strongs id="g5083" m="PerfPasPtc" /] in Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /], [and] called [strongs id="g2822" /]:

I will [strongs id="g1014" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] therefore [strongs id="g1161" /] put [strongs id="g5279" /] you [strongs id="g5209" /] in remembrance [strongs id="g5279" m="AorActInf" /], though ye [strongs id="g5209" /] once [strongs id="g0530" /] knew [strongs id="g1492" m="PerfActPtc" /] this [strongs id="g5124" /], how that [strongs id="g3754" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /], having saved [strongs id="g4982" m="AorActPtc" /] the people [strongs id="g2992" /] out of [strongs id="g1537" /] the land [strongs id="g1093" /] of Egypt [strongs id="g0125" /], afterward [strongs id="g1208" /] destroyed [strongs id="g0622" m="AorActInd" /] them that believed [strongs id="g4100" m="AorActPtc" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /].

Yet [strongs id="g1161" /] Michael [strongs id="g3413" /] the archangel [strongs id="g0743" /], when [strongs id="g3753" /] contending [strongs id="g1252" m="PresMidPtc" /] with the devil [strongs id="g1228" /] he disputed [strongs id="g1256" m="ImpfMidPasDepInd" /] about [strongs id="g4012" /] the body [strongs id="g4983" /] of Moses [strongs id="g3475" /], durst [strongs id="g5111" m="AorActInd" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] bring against him [strongs id="g2018" m="Aor2ActInf" /] a railing [strongs id="g0988" /] accusation [strongs id="g2920" /], but [strongs id="g0235" /] said [strongs id="g2036" m="Aor2ActInd" /], The Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] rebuke [strongs id="g2008" m="AorActOpt" /] thee [strongs id="g4671" /].

But [strongs id="g1161" /] these [strongs id="g3778" /] speak evil of [strongs id="g0987" m="PresActInd" /] those things which [strongs id="g3745" /] [strongs id="g3303" /] they know [strongs id="g1492" m="PerfActInd" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /]: but [strongs id="g1161" /] what [strongs id="g3745" /] they know [strongs id="g1987" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] naturally [strongs id="g5447" /], as [strongs id="g5613" /] brute [strongs id="g0249" /] beasts [strongs id="g2226" /], in [strongs id="g1722" /] those things [strongs id="g5125" /] they corrupt themselves [strongs id="g5351" m="PresPasInd" /].

Woe [strongs id="g3759" /] unto them [strongs id="g0846" /]! for [strongs id="g3754" /] they have gone [strongs id="g4198" m="AorPasDepInd" /] in the way [strongs id="g3598" /] of Cain [strongs id="g2535" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] ran greedily after [strongs id="g1632" m="AorPasInd" /] the error [strongs id="g4106" /] of Balaam [strongs id="g0903" /] for reward [strongs id="g3408" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] perished [strongs id="g0622" m="Aor2MidInd" /] in the gainsaying [strongs id="g0485" /] of Core [strongs id="g2879" /].

These [strongs id="g3778" /] are [strongs id="g1526" m="PresInd" /] spots [strongs id="g4694" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] your [strongs id="g5216" /] feasts of charity [strongs id="g0026" /], when they feast [strongs id="g4910" m="PresMidPasDepPtc" /] with you [strongs id="g5213" /], feeding [strongs id="g4165" m="PresActPtc" /] themselves [strongs id="g1438" /] without fear [strongs id="g0870" /]: clouds [strongs id="g3507" /] [they are] without water [strongs id="g0504" /], carried about [strongs id="g4064" m="PresPasPtc" /] of [strongs id="g5259" /] winds [strongs id="g0417" /]; trees [strongs id="g1186" /] whose fruit withereth [strongs id="g5352" /], without fruit [strongs id="g0175" /], twice [strongs id="g1364" /] dead [strongs id="g0599" m="Aor2ActPtc" /], plucked up by the roots [strongs id="g1610" m="AorPasPtc" /];
